snippet: Hillary Clinton and Senator Bernie Sanders put aside the hard feelings over the breach of her voter data, while they and Martin O’Malley had heated exchanges on foreign policy and corporate America.
abstract: Hillary Clinton seizes every opportunity to criticize Republican field during Democratic debate; aggressively defending herself against repeated criticisms from Sen Bernie Sanders and former Maryland Gov Martin O'Malley, Clinton uses debate to frame 2016 presidential election as choice between herself and Republicans.

byline.original: By JONATHAN MARTIN and AMY CHOZICK

lead_paragraph: Hillary Clinton and Senator Bernie Sanders put aside the hard feelings over the breach of her voter data, while they and Martin O’Malley had heated exchanges on foreign policy and corporate America.

headline.main: In Democratic Debate, Hillary Clinton’s Focus Is on G.O.P.
headline.print_headline: Clinton’s Focus in 3rd Debate Is G.O.P. Field
